wikipedia_page.main: Brian Clifton (15 March 1934 – 12 January 2020) was an English retired footballer who played at either inside-forward or half-back for Southampton and Grimsby Town in the 1950s and 1960s.

response: In the early fifties, locally born Brian Clifton played for Portals before enjoying a long professional career with Southampton and Grimsby Town. Latterly, the former Leicester City and Southampton defender Ian White played for the club from 1968 to 1972 and for a spell was their player-manager.
* 12 January 2020: Brian Clifton, 85, Southampton and Grimsby Town inside forward/half back.
*Brian Clifton, 85, English footballer (Southampton, Grimsby Town, Boston United).Brian Clifton: An appreciation
